name: Castle Shadowgate
overview: Shadowgate, a point and click adventure game developed by ICOM Simulations for the Apple Macintosh, was ported to many platforms. However, an official version was never released (or developed?) for the Commodore 64 (two of ICOM's other "MacVenture" games were released for the C64). This is a new port of the game, heavily based on the popular Nintendo Entertainment System version. Please check out the manual before giving it a try. Last updated 1/30/2023.
